""Individuals only. No agencies.No direct contact with company employees outside of Upwork. This will immediately be reported to Upwork and your bid will be blacklisted.Fast growing young company in the FinTech sector. Looking for Sr QA Analyst to join our product development team.You will define extensive test cases and perform functional testing on all features to be deployed within our product. You will also seek out and test edge cases and exceptional scenarios. You will assist with implementing and maintaining a test automation framework with the goal of increasing our overall regression test coverage across the product. Ultimately, your work will have direct impact on the stability and user experience of our products.• Perform functional testing on features to be deployed to our live product• Perform regression testing on primary workflows to ensure feature changes do not impact current functionality• Assist product management in defining functional use cases and test scenarios to match, including edge cases• Create sample data to use for testing various use cases• Assist with developing sprint velocity metrics to improve speed of delivery of critical features. This includes:◦ Bug / defect tracking◦ Sprint cycle time◦ Developer workload• Consistently measure and improve functional test coverage across all functional workflows.• Document test procedures to ensure repeatability• Develop or specify standards, methods, or procedures to determine product quality or release readiness.• Contribute to coordination, prioritization and sequencing of testing multiple features in a very busy sprint• Must have technical proficiency in these areas:◦ Git commands – checkout, pull, merge, commit, push◦ Write SQL queries to interact with relational databases◦ Read and understand application logs◦ Shell or python scripting is a huge plus• Experience supporting our technical stack:◦ Node.js◦ React◦ Postgres◦ AWS S3• Experience with QA automation tools. Direct experience with Katalon or Selenium is required.• Bring new ideas to the table to help us improve our agile development workflowIndividuals only. No agencies.No direct contact with company employees outside of Upwork. ""Job Description:We are seeking a skilled and experienced mobile app developer to create a user-friendly and efficient app for our antique appraisal platform. The purpose of the app is to allow users to upload images of their antique products for appraisal by our experts. The app should have separate dashboards and login systems for both appraisers and users, along with the following key features:Appraiser Dashboard/Login: A secure dashboard and login system for appraisers to access the platform, view pending appraisals, and submit their evaluations.User Dashboard/Login: An intuitive dashboard and login system for users to upload images of their antique products, track the status of their appraisals, and view past evaluations.Image Database: A robust database to store all images uploaded by users for appraisal purposes, ensuring secure storage and easy retrieval.Built-in Camera Capture: Integration of a built-in camera feature to allow users to capture images of their antique items directly within the app.Appraised Items Database: A separate database to store appraised items, including details such as appraisal value, age, and other relevant information.Email Notifications: Automated email notifications to users informing them once their item has been appraised, along with the appraisal results.Points System: Implementation of a points system where users earn points based on the age and value of their antique items, encouraging user engagement and participation.Raffle Tool: Integration of a built-in raffle tool to store users' raffle entries in a database/container, and facilitate the selection of winners for raffle prizes.We are looking for a developer with expertise in mobile app development, database management, user authentication, and integration of third-party tools. The ideal candidate should have a proven track record of developing similar apps, excellent communication skills, and the ability to deliver high-quality work within the specified timeline.If you are passionate about creating innovative solutions and have the skills required to bring our antique appraisal platform to life, we would love to hear from you. ""Bij PromptGorillas in Rotterdam leiden we mensen op tot Prompt Specialist. Het bedrijf is opgericht met het uitgangspunt dat AI voor marketeers onmisbaar gaat zijn in de toekomst.
